name: DroneSet
description: Entity representing a complete drone set in the military unit

set_serial_number.description: Unique serial number for the entire drone set

assigned_to.description: Soldier ID of the soldier this set is assigned to

components.description: Key-value pairs of component roles and their SerializedGear IDs

status.description: The overall status of the drone set

division_name.description: The division the drone set belongs to

armory_status.description: Whether the drone set is with the soldier or deposited

deposit_location.description: Specific location where the drone set is deposited (only applies when armory_status is 'in_deposit')

comments.description: Additional comments or notes about the drone set.
